description:
The World's Fastest Image Viewer

Experience the next generation of image viewing. Blazing-fast loading speeds, ultra-low memory usage, and powerful built-in tools — all in one lightweight app. Easily find photos by date taken, batch convert HEIC to JPEG, and add thumbnails for HEIC, SVG & PSD in Windows Explorer. Enhance your experience with powerful real-time visual effects.

- Blazing Fast ​and Lightweight Image Viewer
- Real-time image processing enhances your viewing experience
- Search photos by capture date
- Supports full-screen and borderless image viewing
- Modern design with flexible color themes
- Batch conversion from HEIC to JPEG format
- Add thumbnails for HEIC, SVG, TGA & PSD in Windows Explorer
- Supports dozens of image formats including JPG, PNG, WEBP, HEIC, AVIF, and more
- 100% free for personal and commercial use.
- No ads. No bloat. Just pure speed.

Version 1.6 ( 2504 ) - Oct 21, 2025
- Move the window by clicking and dragging the image.
- Automatic background adjustment for SVG images when too light or too dark in the current theme.
- Checkerboard background for transparent images.
- JPEG XL (JXL) support.
- Fixed blurring issue when opening AVIF images.
- Improved file association handling.
- Added zoom speed control for image scaling.
- Fixed errors during overwrite installation.
